page.syntax: Formatted_String as C = PADC(C,N length,C pad_string)

argument.name: length
argument.description: A positive integer representing the length of the Formatted_String. If Length is less than len(Unformatted_String), then Unformatted_String will be truncated to Length. Numeric

argument.name: pad_string
argument.description: The character string to append to the beginning and end of Unformatted_String to center it within Formatted_String.

page.description: Pads both sides of a string with another string.
page.discussion: PADC() pads a C_string on both sides with the Pad_String and returns a string of the specified Length. You can use the pad functions to define calculated fields that create titles within reports as shown in the following Example
page.example: padc("$" + ltrim( str(AMOUNT) ), 20, "***") -> ***$2000***, if AMOUNT contains 2000 padc("Hello", 10, "_") -> "_Hello" padc("Hello", 3, "*") -> "Hel"
